channel.title: Rss on Cravey.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Rss on Cravey.dev

item.description:
Miniflux RSS#

I’m really not a fan of news and social feeds. I’ve gone on and off of RSS since 2010ish, trying different readers and whatnot, but always ending up at a different feed.

Miniflux is nice, it does everything any RSS reader does, but gives a lot more flexibility because it’s its own backend. The global feed is manageable and the categories are clean.

Flexibility comes in writing feed-specific rules.
